description: This file defines a location repository using Google Play Services for obtaining user location data, providing a suspendable interface and implementations for last known and current location retrieval.

classes.name: UserLocation
classes.description: Data class representing a user's geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude).

classes.name: FusedLocationRepository
classes.description: Implementation of LocationRepository that uses Google Play Services to fetch the device's location.

methods.name: getCurrentLocation
methods.description: Suspending function that retrieves the current user location, using last known location if available, otherwise requesting current location from Google Play Services.

methods.name: await
methods.description: Extension function that converts a Task<T> into a suspend function, resuming with the result or throwing an exception upon failure or cancellation.
